tasks.label: Create a new example
tasks.detail: Creates a new example and pushes it to a newly created remote repository within the subtree
tasks.command: gh repo create collect-sandbox-${input:exampleName} --public && pnpm create ${input:createFramework} examples/${input:exampleName} && git add . && git commit -m 'create examples/${input:exampleName}' && git subtree push --prefix=examples/${input:exampleName} https://github.com/portalhacker/collect-sandbox-${input:exampleName}.git main

tasks.label: Push example to remote
tasks.detail: Pushes changes of the example to the dedicated remote repository within the subtree

inputs.description: Enter the name of the example
Enter the name of the create framework
